search_scripts_placeholder.description: Placeholder displayed in the search field for filtering scripts

recently_used_heading.description: Heading title for recently used scripts

other_scripts_heading.description: Heading title for other un-grouped scripts

no_search_results_message.description: Shown when a search returns no results

empty_state_message.description: Shown when a user does not have any bookmarklets

add_scripts_button.description: Button label to take you to script example page

send_feedback_button.description: Button label to send feedback to developer

getting_started_title.description: Title used on the example scripts page

getting_started_subtitle.message: To add a script, drag it to your Bookmarks Bar.
getting_started_subtitle.description: Subtitle used to explain how to add bookmarklets to the bookmarkbar

edit_script_title.description: Title used on the edit script screen

done_button.description: Button label to say you are done with the current screen

remove_button.description: Button label to say you are performing a destructive remove action

name_field_label.description: Label for a title input field

code_field_label.description: Label for a code input field

remove_script_confirmation.message: Are you sure you want to remove this script?
remove_script_confirmation.description: Confirmation message that is shown when removing a script

new_script_name.description: Default name for a newly created script

script_deleted_toast.description: Message displayed when a script is deleted

move_to_group_label.description: Move to a specific group action label

script_not_visible_toast.message: "%s" is not visible because it's not a bookmarklet.
script_not_visible_toast.description: Message displayed when the script is not a valid bookmarklet

fix_label.description: Label for button to fix a script

script_missing_keyword_message.message: Scripts need to start with the keyword "javascript:".
script_missing_keyword_message.description: Message shown when the script is missing the 'javascript': keyword at the start

enable_developer_mode_title.description: Title for enable developer mode screen

enable_developer_mode_message.message: Please enable the Developer Mode toggle in the extensions page.
enable_developer_mode_message.description: Message shown when developer mode is not enabled
